original_text: Then Solomon woke up. He realized that it was a dream. He returned to Jerusalem and he stood in front of the Lord's Covenant Box. He offered burnt offerings and peace offerings to God there. Then he gave a feast for all his officers.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 깨어 보니 꿈이더라 이에 예루살렘에 이르러 여호와의 언약궤 앞에 서서 번제와 감사의 제물을 드리고 모든 신하들을 위하여 잔치하였더라

sentences.original_text: He realized that it was a dream
and he stood in front of the Lord's Covenant Box
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주의 언약 궤 앞에 섰습니다

sentences.original_text: He offered burnt offerings and peace offerings to God there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에서 하나님께 번제와 화목제를 드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he gave a feast for all his officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 모든 신하들을 위해 잔치를 베풀었습니다
